query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 ( MANDT , HOGI , CHARACTERISTIC , SEQ , VBELN , POSNR , MOWBS , CUOBJ , VALUE , ERNAM , CR_DATE , CR_TIME , TP_STATUS , TP_DATE , TP_TIME , TP_NAME ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #HOGI# , #CHARACTERISTIC# , '01' , #VBELN# , '000000' , #HOGI# , '000000000000000000' , #VALUE# , #G_USER_ID# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , '' , '' , '' , '' )
